de.uulm.vs.android.crdt.controller

Interface CRDTTransaction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CRDTController

    public interface CRDTTransaction
    An interface containing a modified subset of Oracles's javax.transaction.UserTransaction.java.

    Provides an interface for transactions with CRDTs that is similar to the Java Transaction API (JTA).

    See Also:
    http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/transaction/UserTransaction.html , http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javaee/jta/index.html

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CRDTTransaction.TransactionStatus 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beginTransaction()
      Create a new transaction and associate it with the changeListener.
      void commitTransaction()
      Complete the transaction associated with the changeListener.
      CRDTTransaction.TransactionStatus getTransactionStatus()
      Obtain the status of the transaction associated with the changeListener.
      void rollbackTransaction()
      Roll back the transaction associated with the changeListener.
      void setRollbackOnly()
      Modify the transaction associated with the changeListener such that the only possible outcome of the transaction is to roll back the transaction.

    • Method Detail

      • beginTransaction

        void beginTransaction()
               throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Create a new transaction and associate it with the changeListener.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the changeListener is already associated with a transaction

      • commitTransaction

        void commitTransaction()
                throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Complete the transaction associated with the changeListener. When this method completes, the changeListener is no longer associated with a transaction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the changeListener is not associated with a transaction.

      • rollbackTransaction

        void rollbackTransaction()
                  throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Roll back the transaction associated with the changeListener. When this method completes, the changeListener is no longer associated with a transaction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the changeListener is not associated with a transaction.

      • setRollbackOnly

        void setRollbackOnly()
              throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Modify the transaction associated with the changeListener such that the only possible outcome of the transaction is to roll back the transaction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the changeListener is not associated with a transaction.

      • getTransactionStatus

        CRDTTransaction.TransactionStatus getTransactionStatus()
        Obtain the status of the transaction associated with the changeListener.
        Returns:
        The transaction status. If no transaction is associated with the changeListener, this method returns the TransactionStatus.STATUS_NO_TRANSACTION value.
